{exp:cartthrob:request_shipping_quote_form return = "cart_functions/shipping_quote_info" shipping_mode="shop" } {shipping_fields} {/exp:cartthrob:request_shipping_quote_form}
Outputs a form for requesting shipping quotes. Only used by "Live Rates" plugins like UPS or FedEx.
http://cartthrob.com/docs/tags_detail/request_shipping_quote_form/

Use in conjunction with shipping_quote_info
http://cartthrob.com/docs/tags_detail/shipping_quote_info/
